name: Liebe: Is this Love?
description:
SUMMARY:

The story of the game focuses on the love story of Shawn and Abby.

The game is created in RenPy 7.2.1

The game is free to play and if you have more suggestion what to add in the story i might as consider it. 

The game is still on BETA Version 1.0 and will receive future updates so stay tuned.

PLEASE DO NOT REVERSE ENGINEER THE GAME. NO MODIFICATIONS ARE ALLOWED

Thank you for playing, if you like it please consider donating.

All Background Images were Produced by Kimagure After Background Material Storage. The images used is free of licenses. 

All Characters were created and designed by jeruxtakeo27. 

All BGM used were produced by http://sounds-of-grisaia.tumblr.com
